Select a PGL-themed color palette

Source: R/ggplot2-colors.R
pgl_pals.Rd

Select a PGL-themed color palette

pgl_pals(who, what, n)

Arguments

who

The person associated with the palette.
what

The object the palette was extracted from
n

Number of colors to return

Value

A character vector of colors

Examples

pgl_pals("christine", "blueberry_boba", 4)

#> [1] "#5E4950" "#93604F" "#A2919B" "#77722E"
